ChildCareTech.network.RMI

Class RMIUserSessionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • ChildCareTech.network.RMI.RMIUserSessionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserSessionFactory, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIUserSessionFactory
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements UserSessionFactory
    This class is a factory of RMIUserSessionFacade instances. Exposed as a singleton, it provides the creation/storage logic for RMI sessions and the possibility to register users.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Fields inherited from class java.rmi.server.RemoteObject

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RMIUserSessionFactory getSessionFactory() 
      RMIUserSessionFacade login(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Attempt login for user with provided credentials: if those are correct, the method returns an instance of RMIUserSessionFacade, representing the active session for the logged user.
      boolean register(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      See UserController.registerUser(String, String)

        public RMIUserSessionFacade login(java.lang.String userName,
                                  java.lang.String password)
                           throws LoginFailedException,

        Attempt login for user with provided credentials: if those are correct, the method returns an instance of RMIUserSessionFacade, representing the active session for the logged user.
